Export.Routine:
WWWCAL1D12 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; ÃœBERTRAGEN DATUM IN SORTIERUNGSFELD ; ; Inputs : ; ; ; ByRef : YKEY ; ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 26.06.2002 FIS ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NEW DAT
QUIT:$GET(YKEY)=""
SET DAT=$$^WWWDATE1($PIECE(YKEY,",",2)) ;UMWANDELN IN TAGESZAHL ;transmute within DO . NEW SPRACHE . SET SPRACHE="DE" . SET DAT=$$^WWWDATE(DAT) ;DATUM ALS DEUTSCHES FORMAT (NN.NN.NNNN) ;Date when format
SET YINHALT=$EXTRACT(100+$PIECE(DAT,".",1),2,3)_"/"_$EXTRACT(100+$PIECE(DAT,".",2),2,3) IF $PIECE(YKEY,",",1)'="" IF $PIECE(YKEY,",",2)'="" IF $PIECE($GET(^WWWCAL1(0,$PIECE(YKEY,",",1),$PIECE(YKEY,",",2),1)),Y,12)'=YINHALT DO . DO ^WWWSKILL("WWWCAL1",YKEY,1) . SET $PIECE(^WWWCAL1(0,$PIECE(YKEY,",",1),$PIECE(YKEY,",",2),1),Y,12)=YINHALT . DO ^WWWSSORT("WWWCAL1",YKEY)
QUIT
